page.title: 17CODDINGTON HOUSING
page.content: The{village}of Coddington is in a rural setting surrounded by a predominantly agricultural{landscape.} The village is bisected by the A17 and clusters round the Parish Church of All Saints which is built in stone and set back from the road.Other communal {buildings}such as the school,village hall,scout hut and pub are close by. The houses vary from country cottages surrounded by walled gardens to present day semi-detached. The houses are mainly red brick with either clay tiles or slate roofs. The villages only shopping facility is a sub post office cum shop. The Inn on the Green public house provides restaurant facilities.
